sentences.en: And might I suggest these tuxedo pants to go with it?
sentences.cn: 另外我可以推荐这些晚礼服裤子来搭配它 吗 ?

sentences.en: Each man in the wedding party usually dressed formally ? in a tuxedo.
sentences.cn: 通常他们都穿着礼服,打扮得很正规.

sentences.en: Have I told you how amazing you look in this tuxedo?
sentences.cn: 我告诉过你穿这件燕尾服看起来很棒 吗 ?

sentences.en: His shirttails stuck out from his tuxedo pants somewhat incongruously.
sentences.cn: 他衬衫的下摆从他无尾晚礼服的裤腰里翘出来了,看起来有点不协调.

sentences.en: I need to get a custom - made Tuxedo for my wedding.
sentences.cn: 我要为婚礼去定作一件燕尾服.

sentences.en: Jackie Chan is set to star in Steven Spielberg's Tuxedo.
sentences.cn: 成龙将主演史蒂芬?史匹柏的新片《燕尾服》.

sentences.en: Photographs showed them in a tuxedo and an off - the - shoulder gown.
sentences.cn: 照片上姚明穿着礼服,叶莉穿着露肩婚纱.

sentences.en: She was healing children. I was in a tuxedo.
sentences.cn: 她当时替孩子治病, 我穿着礼服.

sentences.en: Therefore, the papers combined personal practical experience, study and research the TUXEDO middleware in large system.
sentences.cn: 因此, 论文结合个人实践经验对TUXEDO中间件大型系统中的应用做深入探讨和研究.

sentences.en: Tonight's party is a black - tie affair. You have to wear a tuxedo.
sentences.cn: 今晚的舞会是正式场合. 你必须穿燕尾服.

sentences.en: Tuxedo: a very formal suit worn by men at important occasions.
sentences.cn: 男士无尾晚礼服: 男士在重要场合穿的很正式的套装.

sentences.en: Vernon was elegant in his tuxedo , Irene fashionable in her loose gown.
sentences.cn: 身着燕尾服,Vernon显得优雅大方,穿上宽松的礼袍, Irene显得 非常时尚高雅.

sentences.en: Well reverend, you think you can lay your hands on a tuxedo?
sentences.cn: 好吧,教士, 你能找件燕尾服穿上 吗 ?

sentences.en: Well, you have your own tuxedo.
sentences.cn: 噢, 你有自己的燕尾服.

sentences.en: You should wearing a tuxedo if you are the award winner.
sentences.cn: 如果你是获奖者的话,你应该穿燕尾服.

words.tran_cn: 男士无尾半正式晚礼服；无尾礼服

trans.tran_en: a man’s  jacket  that is usually black, worn on formal occasions
